question: What are the names of mentioned capital improvement projects?
raw_answer: Civic Center Way Improvements, Westward Beach Road Improvements, Latigo Canyon Road Roadway/Retaining Wall Improvements.
evidence_answer: Westward Beach Road Improvements Project, Civic Center Way Improvements, Latigo Canyon Road Roadway/Retaining Wall Improvements, Civic Center Water Treatment Facility Phase 2
extracted_search_list: Latigo Canyon Road Roadway/Retaining Wall Improvements

(cid:190) Updates:

(cid:131) The design plans were approved by Planning Commission on

2021 Annual Street Maintenance

(cid:190) Updates: This project included resurfacing Malibu Road, Broad Beach Road,

Street and Vista Pacifica with a slurry seal treatment and adding speed
humps to Birdview Avenue.

Broad Beach Road Water Quality Infrastructure Repairs (CalJPIA Project)

(cid:190) Updates:

(cid:131) The project consultant prepared the specifications for the project.

The project will also include the installation of new raised
medians on PCH in the areas where the double yellow lines exist in the vicinity
of Zuma Beach, specifically where the yellow paddles are installed.

(cid:190) Project Description: This project was identified in the 2015 PCH Safety Study
and includes installing new raised medians and improvements.

New raised
medians are proposed east and west of PCH and Paradise Cove Road.

The improvements modified the existing concrete
channel underneath Civic Center Way by adding a 3’ concrete curb adjacent
to the existing flap gates.

Civic Center Way are.

Safety Commissions
to develop project
alternatives.
